page.syntax: Decoded_Data as B = a5_decrypt_binary(B Source ,C Key [,C Algorithm [,B Initializer ]])

argument.name: Key
argument.description: The text used to decode SourceString.

argument.name: Algorithm
argument.description: Optional. Default = "Blowfish". Refer to Encryption Algorithms.

argument.name: Initializer
argument.description: Optional. Additional information to be provided by advanced users depending on the algorithm they use. Refer to the OpenSSL site at www.openssl.org for more information.

page.description: Decrypts an encrypted binary and returns the original binary.
page.discussion: The A5_Decrypt_Binary() function decodes binary data.
page.example:
dim bd as B
bd = a5_encrypt_binary("alpha software", "abc")
? a5_decrypt_binary(bd, "abc") = alpha software
